text: DAVE LOCKWOOD, 30, bleary-eyed father of three, shuffles through his well-appointed suburban home, passing a grandfather clock reading 3:45. He stumbles over a TOY GIRAFFE -- it SQUEAKS, and Dave sleepily mumbles:
Sorry Hank.
His eyes half-open, Dave changes the diaper of his very c very insane nine month old daughter, SARAH, who screams a pitches about her changing table.

Honey, that's not-- Maybe if you-- She snatches a tin of baby powder and swings it about lik mace, knocking over the diaper caddy, the wipes, the loti and dispersing a cloud of white powder all over the nurse Blinded and SNEEZING, Dave manages to stay on point and change the diaper like Van Damme at the end of Bloodsport

Can't-see ...must...persevere... He finishes changing Sarah, places her back in her crib, picks up Sarah's twin brother, PETER, from his crib -- wh is good because he's been SLAMMING his head against the w

Come on, buddy, we've talked about the head thing-- Dave places Peter on the changing table and opens his dia It's only wet, and Dave, pleasantly relieved, reaches for fresh diaper... 2. Only Sarah has knocked the caddy all the way down the changing table... Holding down Peter with his left hand, Dave fully extends leaning waaay over, reaching for the diaper caddy... It's just out of reach.. .he somehow stretches further... It's only when Dave glances back that he realizes that hi head is now perfectly lined up with his son's QUIVERING A
Oh no.
with mustardy projectile stool, blasting Dave in the eyes nose and open mouth. Dave remains frozen, excrement dripp down his face -- but, like a true dad, he does not let go his squirming child...
Dave staggers down the hall, his hair white with baby pow his face covered in poo, and a twin in each arm SCREAMING into each of his ears. He soldiers on, stoic, an unsung hero in his time...

Juggling the twins in his arms, Dave wipes his face off w paper towels and prepares two baby bottles -- nipples, filters, defrosted breastmilk -- while the babies take tu kicking him in the balls and SCREAMING.
Please, sweetheart, not my-- Honey, Daddy needs those--

Dave sits on his couch and positions the screaming, squir twins across his lap in an X pattern, plunks the bottles their mouths -- and instantly the twins settle down and s away like perfect little angels. Dave exhales. Whew. Then he reaches for the remote contro and turns on the TV. An old rerun of Magnum, P.I. is play Dave watches, exhausted and expressionless. 3. ON SCREEN, Tom Selleck, resplendent in mustache, corduroy short shorts, and Hawaiian shirt, teaches a nubile CO-ED scandalous bikini how to snorkel in beautiful sun-drenche Waikiki. They're laughing and having a blast... Dave watches, detached... Then his face starts to change. MAGNUM, P.I. Is this the life you always dreamed of? Dave shakes his head, no, despair in his eyes... ON TV, the co-ed nods, yes, and hungrily kisses Magnum... Dave watches on with genuine existential longing... and s tear falls from his eye. And then another.
Take me with you Magnum P. I... Before long Dave is CRYING like a schoolgirl.
Please take me with you...
How are the kids?
Terrific! Just terrific. We are now
Dave, in a conservative suit and clutching a massive coff hurries down the hall with FLEMMING STEEL III, 50's, stif humorless WASPY partner of this white shoe law firm.
Children are such a joy.
Aren't they? Yes. Always. (to passing SECRETARY) Good morning, Rebecca.
Any word on the Amalgamated merger? 4.
All but signed.
And just in time for your partner review no less.
Really? I hadn't noticed.
I look forward to having your antic sense of humor in the partners' suite, Lockwood. It can get a touch dry up there.
Thank you, sir.
(re: Dave's necktie knot) But a double windsor? Come on, son, this isn't the dog track.
No sir, absolutely not. So sorry. Dave quickly undoes his tie as Flemming turns down a hall SABRINA McARDLE, cute young paralegal, falls into step wi Dave, stymieing laughter.
Really? The dog track?
Last week he told me my shoes were "dangerously Italian."
(laughing, handing him docs) Amalgamated signing statements.
Thanks, Sabrina.

Have a good one... She smiles and breezes back down the hallway. Dave stops watches her go, lust in his eyes. 5. Then he hears TSK-TSK-TSK. He looks over at his mean old secretary, GLADYS, 71, sitting at her desk.
For shame, Mr. Lockwood! For shame! You are a married man!
I have no idea what you're talking about, Gladys... Reddening, he snatches a huge pile of pink message slips hurries towards his office. She follows him, scolding:
With children.
Yes, thank you, I almost forgot about them for like two seconds...
Dave enters his modest office; his phone is RINGING.
The only thing that harlot needs to put in her mouth is a sandwich.
Gladys, I'm a grown man, okay? He angrily punches "SPEAKER" on his RINGING phone as he reties his tie with a more traditional knot.
Lockwood. A shrill, horribly impersonated British accent fills Dave office -- as well as all of the surrounding offices.

head_text.subj: MORNING AND I'D LIKE TO SUE--

text: As Gladys and various CO-WORKERS turn, shocked, Dave quic fumbles for the receiver and takes the call off speaker.
Jesus, Mitch, I'm at work-- 6.

text: Dude, how stoned are you?
MITCH PLANKO, 30, shirtless, Dodgers hat backwards, sitti on a futon in his sparse white apartment, smoking a bong shaped like a shotgun. Beat. He drops the horrible accent
I'm pretty stoned.
Come on, it's 10 in the morning.
Dude, guess what? Great news.
What?
I found a futon on the street.
That is great news.
I sort of had to fight a bum for it -- is that bad?
Kind of. Is there a reason you're calling or--?
Are you gonna bitch out on tonight? You are, aren't you. Dave, half-listening, sits at his desk and answers emails
Dodgers-Giants, dude! We haven't missed one of these in like 20 years! Don't be a vajeen!
Dude, I'm coming-- 7.
You always do this! You never make time for your friends anymore and I'm sorry to be the one to tell you this, but people are starting to talk. Feelings are getting hurt.
Really? Whose feelings?

Not mine, because, like a samurai, I have trained myself to feel nothing except revenge and honor, but other people -- nameless, other, more sensitive people -- are hurt, and they think you need to treasure your friendships a little bit more. (exhaling massive bong rip) How concerned should I be that my new futon smells like death?
(distracted, typing) Look, just, what time are you picking me up tonight?
If you bail I will rape you.
Dude, I get it, I'm coming--
In your eye. I will eye-rape you.
Just then there's a knock on Mitch's apartment door.
Mitch?
Shit. Mitch starts waving away the pot smoke.

Gotta go, pick you up at six--! 8. STAY WITH MITCH as he quickly clicks off his iPhone, jams bong under the futon, opens the window, and tries to blow pot smoke out of his apartment with quick little PUFFS.

One sec, Dad! The smoke clears and Mitch jogs to the door and opens it reveal his father, MITCH, SR., 60's, friendly, in a suit, holding a pile of mail. MITCH, SR. Hey, buddy! Your mailbox was spilling over.
Oh thanks, I always forget. They hug, and Mitch takes the mail and, without looking a it, chucks it onto a HUGE PILE OF OLD MAIL in the corner. MITCH, SR. Were you smoking marijuana in here?

No! Honestly, it's my new futon, it smells like illegal drugs. MITCH, SR. We've talked about this, Mitch. Smoke your grass on the balcony, okay? It's just hard for me to tell the other tenants they can't smoke in their units when my own son is blazing away in his, you know?
You got it, Dad. MITCH, SR. Oh hey, I saw your commercial on channel 9 again last night...

Which one? "Give Gonorrhea The Boot" or "Samir's Pet Shack Our Low Low Prices Are Snake-sational?" MITCH, SR. Samir's Pet Shack. It's just a shame you can't see your face in that giant ape costume. 9.

Actually, the real shame is that Samir paid me in fucking organic bird seed, but whatever... He glares at several crates of BIRD SEED by the door. MITCH, SR. Well, your mother would've liked it. She always loved animals...
Anyway. I was just in the neighborhood, wanted to check in. How you doing, cash-wise?
I'm a little tight, actually, Pops. Especially vis a vis, you know, the whole bird seed situation. MITCH, SR. Five hundred?
Can you make it a grand? Mitch's dad smiles to hide his disappointment and hands h 30-year-old son a roll of hundred dollar bills. MITCH, SR. You thought any more about coming to work for me?
Yeeeah...I'm not really sure I'm a "work" guy, you know what I mean? Plus, I've been getting a ton of auditions recently, so... MITCH, SR. Okay, well, my door is always open.
Thanks, pop. Bones. Mitch, Sr. smiles and awkwardly bumps his son's fist.
Batting cages next weekend? MITCH, SR. Great! See you then. 10. Mitch, Sr. smiles sadly and exits. Mitch BURPS and reache for his bong, having noticed none of his father's distres
ESTABLISHING SHOTS of Dave's beautiful colonial home. Hug oak trees shade the lush front lawn. New Audi and BMW sta wagons sit in the driveway. We hear WATER SPLASHING...
The twins sit in the bath, motionless, anticipatory...

Dave rises up from beside the tub, arms upraised, soap su covering his face! The twins SCREAM and SPLASH, ecstatic! Dave tries not to laugh, but he's having too much fun... Behind Dave, his sweet daughter CARA, 5, sits on the clos toilet lid in a ballet tutu, reading her BUTTERFLY BOOK.
Daddy daddy, which is your favorite butterfly, the Southern Monarch or the Many-Spotted Skipperling? Dave glances at the book as he washes the twins.
Oh, I'm a Many-Spotted Skipperling man all the way. The Southern Monarch is just a glorified moth.
Yes. I tend to agree... Dave smiles. Then his handsome wife JAMIE, 30's, blows in the bathroom in a suit and starts removing her makeup.
What a day. Dr. Klein lost the twins immunization record, the wireless went down, and Cara got bullied in ballet class again. 11.
Nicolette Peters keeps knocking me over during the battement glisse.
Oh, I'm sorry, sugar-bug... Dave looks genuinely concerned. Cara just shrugs and keep reading her butterfly book. Jamie whispers to him:
We need to remind her to keep striving for verbal resolution.
Right, of course. Jamie finally notices Dave's foam-covered face, and softe
And how was your day, monster man? Before Dave can answer, the doorbell rings, DING-DONG! Th exchange the weary smile of parents who never see each ot
He's early.
Of course he's early. All he does all day is eat hummus and masturbate.
to reveal MITCH in shades, fedora, and a Dodgers jersey. Jamie, holding Cara, lets him in.
Whatup bitches!
Really? He takes Cara and playfully -- and incredibly recklessly flips her in the air.
How's my favorite ballerina?! 12.
I'm good! Are you coming to my recital on Thursday?!
Oh no, honey, the only style of dancing I support is exotic... He plunks her on the floor and blows into
replete with granite counter tops, built-in appliances, f flowers, and bowls teeming with fruit. Mitch beelines for Subzero fridge and opens it: it's stocked. His eyes aligh

Jesus Christ you could feed Africa with this fridge... As Jamie starts prepping a salad across the kitchen, Mitc raids the fridge, packing his cargo pants with kid's snac bagels, yogurts, juice boxes, everything.
These leftovers from Morton's?
Oh no, hon, those are super old-- Too late -- Mitch is already eating the very old steak.
Chimichurri. score. As Mitch chews, he eyes Jamie chopping vegetables.
You look hot by the way, Jame. Jamie laughs but clearly doesn't mind the flirtation.
Thanks... sort of...?
No really. I never would've guessed twins.
Annnd that's probably enough-- 13.
Is Dave still meeting your needs sexually? Jamie just laughs, shaking her head, unbelievable.
Oh, did I tell you I ran into Miss Hickam last week at Starbucks?
Our old kindergarten teacher?!
Yeah. She always liked Dave better than me...
Honey, everyone likes Dave better than you.

Fair enough. Anyway, I tried to get her number, but she goes "I don't date former students," so I go, "great, do you fuck former students?" and then she calls me a "potty-mouth degenerate" and runs out without her coffee. So I got a free venti macchiato, which is cool-
Bathed, changed and in their Pis. Mitch turns to see Dave in khakis and a buttondown, enter the kitchen with the freshly bathed twins. Mitch grins:
Awww! Come to Uncle Mitch... Dave hands the twins to Mitch, and they COO, impishly cut
Oh my God, they smell like heaven had sex with a dryer sheet. (loudly to babies)
(they just GURGLE) Why can't they talk yet? Are they retarded or something? 14.
What?! No! They're fine!
Really? The one on the left looks a little downsy.
Kidding! Kidding. (aside, to Dave) A little bit though, right? Ignoring him, Dave fastens the twins into their Bouncy Se
I'll be back right after the game, okay, Pumpkin?
Whenever. Have fun.
See you, Jame!
Always a pleasure, Mitch. Mitch steals THREE PEARS and some TULIPS as he exits...
on the bottle cap-opener mounted on Mitch's dashboard...
Mitch offers Dave one of (his own) beers as they speed al in his Fiero. Dave is reluctant.
Yeah, I'm good.
Really? You're going to make me drink alone?
Yeah, well, you're driving, so... Mitch shrugs and slides the spare beer into his chest poc 15.
Oh, dude: great news.
You found another futon?
That's awesome, because I'm made of emotional Teflon and words can't hurt me anymore. No: I auditioned for a major movie role yesterday.
Nice. What movie?
It's called Busted Dreams 4. It's about a renegade coroner who reads minds named Jake Action. It's like a sexy Mentalist.
Sounds cool.

Yeah, I read for the part of Steve Action, Jake's troubled younger brother with a secret, and I fucking killed it. I cried like five times during the audition and it's a fucking action movie. Plus I'm the spitting image of the dude who plays Jake Action, so...
I hope you get it, man.
Yeah, it could be my Raging Bull. Plus I'd get to kill a lot of women, which is cool. (offering him a joint) Hotbox?
No, man, I got a big day tomorrow, I can't get wasted tonight.
Mitch and Dave, shit-faced, shake off their shots, B-R-R- 16.
The guys sit in this crowded sports bar, watching the Dod game on a huge TV. When CLAYTON KERSHAW strikes out FRED LEWIS to win the game, the guys drunkenly slap five:
Change-up -- fuck he's good!
He's no Fernando.
Of course not. Fernando is like The Highlander. There can be only one.
(toasting his beer)
They sloppily drink -- when Dave suddenly remembers:
OH! So finish your story! The girl calls you up...?
Right! So she calls me up, it's like 3 in the morning--
What's her name?
Tatiana.
Incredible. What's her last name? Mitch just looks at him. 17.
Tatiana Calls-Me-At-3-In-The- Morning-And-Wants-To-Fuck-stein, what the fuck, who cares?
Is she hot? She is, right? Oh my God I already have a boner!
Maybe we should do this later...
NO! Keep going! I need these stories, man! They're all I have. Mitch registers the desperation in his married friend's e
Okay, well, you're in luck, because Tatiana is stupid fucking hot. Beautiful face, legs a mile long, perfect ass, blonde hair, and huuuge boobs.
Oh my God how big?
Double E.
Oh my God she sounds like Sabrina.
Who's Sabrina?
This hot paralegal in my office.
Is she on your Cancer List?
What's a Cancer List?
Don't all married dudes have a Cancer List? No? Like the first three chicks you would bang if your wife suddenly died of cancer? 18.
That's sick, man. Jamie is the mother of my children...
But yes, if I had a Cancer List, Sabrina would be the first on it.
Who's number two? Fergie--?
Just finish your story, man! I'm dying over here!

Fine. So Tatiana's packing double E's, which means like 20 plus pounds of breastmeat -- yeah, it's almost too much for one man to handle. Thank God I'm the son of a butcher and have strong hands and wrists. Anyway, she walks in wearing this tight black dress, and you know what she says to me? Dave shakes his head, on the edge of his bar stool.
Nothing. Because all Tatiana wants to do at 3 in the morning is fucky fucky rubber ducky! Dave drunkenly slaps him ten, barely making hand-contact.
And look, I'm not one to kiss and tell... (downing another shot) but this chick is insatiable. She wants it in every position: Missionary, wheelbarrow, Reverse Wheelbarrow, Assassin--
I don't even know what those are!
No one does! It gets so intense that my nose starts bleeding. Yeah, so I'm bleeding all over this chick and she's fucking digging it.

It's like some weird Dracula Anne Rice shit, and I'm fading in and out of consciousness, and then, when it's all over, she turns to me and goes: "Tuesday night I'm coming back and we're really going to fuck." Dave just stares at him, glassy-eyed, drunk, emotional.
That is maybe the single greatest story I've ever heard in my life.
Ah, it's not always like that...
I don't know why...I don't know why I've always been in such a rush, you know?
do you mean?

You remember me in high school, I was always so focussed on getting into a good college, then when I got to college, I was so focussed on getting into a good law school, then in law school I was just trying to land a job at a good firm, then Jamie and I got married and we had Cara right away-- I just feel like and I missed out on all the fun stuff, you know? The sex, the drugs, the bad choices, and now it's too late. I blew it. I pissed away my 20's, and now I'm staring down the barrel a seriously boring life.
Oh come on, Jamie is hot!
No, I know--
I really want to have sex with her! 20.
Wait, what?

And your kids are adorable! They're like fun little puppies that talk! The bill comes. Dave pulls out a wad of cash, throws it o the table, and stumbles for the door. Mitch lifts one of Dave's twenties off the table and follows him out...
They stumble down the dark Hollywood street together...
Don't get me wrong, I love my kids, I do, I would take a bullet for them, but...remember that heroin addict you dated?
Tara? Or Rena? Or Rachel?
Jesus, how many heroin addicts have you dated?
It's a national scourge, dude.

Anyway. Having kids is like dating a heroin addict, only instead of dating them, they move into your house for 18 years. They're laughing one second and crying the next and then they're trying to kill themselves in your bathroom for no reason. They're mean and selfish and they burn through all your money and they steal your shit and they break everything and they stay up all night and they listen to really shitty music and the dirty secret is, no one actually likes kids.
Oh come on, you don't mean that-- 21.

No! It's true. Everyone pretends to like kids because if you don't you look like a huge dick. It's like Drew Barrymore or jazz. No one actually likes them, but if you say that out loud, everybody hates you.
Dude, I love Drew Barrymore -- have you seen Boys on the Side? They weave across a LARGE PLAZA, stumbling for Mitch's ca
I'm just saying: don't fuck up your life like I did, okay?

What are you talking about? You've got it all! You've got a huge house full of food and furniture -- shit, your TV is bigger than my car! You have a great job, you make a shit- ton of money, and people respect you, man! My last job involved an ape costume -- do you know what that does to a man? Dave waves him off, not really hearing him. But Mitch is sincere, heartfelt:
Plus you've got a hot, extremely fuckable wife who cooks and cleans and takes care of all your needs! It's like having a really hot mom who you can also have sex with!
Wait, what--?

Also you're never lonely, you always have someone to talk to about your day, plus you get to do all the fun gay couple stuff like go to wine country! You think single guys can go to wine country?! No way! They won't even let us in! You're living the dream, dude! What more do you want?! 22.

Tatiana! I want Tatiana! I want sex with strange new women and maybe also with Sabrina if she's single and I want to wake up at noon and smoke weed all afternoon and I want to not think about the needs of four other people 24 hours a day and I want to start reading a novel and actually finish it and I want to take a solid shit because I'm not constantly stressed out and I want to learn how to rollerblade and also I really want to pee...
Yeah, me too... They look around the plaza, and their eyes land on the HU FOUNTAIN in the middle; a GREEK GODDESS sits atop it.
Fountain?
Bingo. They stumble over to the fountain, unzip their pants, and leaning on each other, begin peeing into it. Mitch glance at the GREEK GODDESS METIS. She scowls down at them.
This chick does not look happy.
Maybe she has three kids and a job she hates.
Dude, enough already.
I'm just saying...I envy your life.
And that's what's so fucked, because I envy yours.
Yeah you don't--
I do! 23.
No, I do--!
I wish I had your life! I wish I had your life! They're about to say "jinx" when--
A thunder clap CRASHES and
the electrical grid starts shutting down, neighborhood by neighborhood! Soon the entire city is PITCH BLACK...
Dave and Mitch freeze, terrified, hugging. . .and peeing.
Ummmmm...? Then all the lights in the city flicker back to life...
R-Rolling blackout?
I guess...? They continue peeing, a little freaked out.
You really have nice flow by the way. Very thick and confident.
Thank you. Yours is very steamy.
Thank you. My urologist says I run a little warm. Eventually they both finish, tuck in, and zip up. Beat.
You good to drive?
Now I am. 24. As they stumble off towards Mitch's Fiero, HOLD ON the st of Metis, the shape-shifting Greek Goddess of Wisdom... It almost looks like she's smiling...
It's a beautiful sunny Los Angeles morning. The silhouett a body lies in Dave's bed, SNORING away. Then we hear
followed by what is unequivocally Mitch's patter -- and h
Whose fucking baby is that...? A hand emerges and fumbles on the night stand.

And where the fuck is my bong? He groggily rises from the sheets -- only it's not Mitch. It's Dave. His body, his face, everything. Yup, you got it: the single auy and the married guy have switched bodies. We will refer to them by their "brain names," thus while this hungover dude definitely looks li Dave, inside he's Mitch, so that's what we'll call him. T actors, of course, will remain in their bodies. Mitch doesn't know any of this yet.

Why are there so many fucking pillows...? He rolls over to see Jamie, sitting up in bed, pulling he breasts out of her tank top, getting ready to nurse the twins. Mitch launches out of bed, suddenly very awake.
She starts breast-feeding the babies, confused.
What? What's your problem? Mitch shields his eyes with his hands, shocked and disgus 25.
Oh my god that is so gross! Put your tits away! This isn't Europe!
What are you talking about? Mitch finally notices he's in DAVE'S BEDROOM...
Wait: why am I in...? Did I sleep here last night?!
Um, yeah?
Did we...?! Panicked, he thrusts his fist like, have sex?!
Are you insane?
So why the hell did I wake up in your bed?!
Are you still drunk?
Look, just, where's Dave?!
What?
Where's fucking Dave?!
Dave is right here! You're Dave! He turns and sees himself in the mirror. Freezes. He is D
Oh my God... Oh my God... He slowly touches his new face... 26.
I'm a fucking tool.
A body lies sprawled on Mitch's futon, out cold. INSANE POUNDING on the door shatters the silence.
The body sits up, groggy and confused -- it is, of course Dave in Mitch's body. While he looks like Mitch, he moves talks, and even shuffles to the door exactly like Dave...
Mitch...?
Fucking open the fucking door! Dave stops, noticing that he's in Mitch's empty apartment
Why am I in your sad apartment--
The door, dude! Open the door!
Fine, Jesus, relax-- Dave opens the door to see himself standing there.
What the fuck is this...? Dave backpedals, terrified, as Mitch blows inside, furiou
I knew it!

Who the hell are you?! And why do you look like me?! Mitch angles Dave over to the mirror on the otherwise bar wall-and Dave sees he's in Mitch's body... Stunned, he slowly touches his new face... his new hair. . .his new b 27.
Oh my God...
I know, dude.
I'm a fucking loser...
Wait, what? Dave spins, completely awake now:
How the fuck did this happen?!
How should I know?! Has this ever happened to you before?!
What, switching bodies with another human being?! Oh yeah, this shit happens to me like twice a week!
Well...I don't want to be you!
Oh, you don't want to be me?! No, no, no: I don't want to be you!
What's that supposed to mean?!
Look, let's just.. .think. How could this have possibly happened...? They pace about the apartment, trying to think... Then:
Bingo. Got it. We're dreaming. Dave grabs Mitch's nipple and twists it hard.
Ow ow ow, fuck!
Not dreaming. 28.
First of all, you're a penis. Second of all--
Wait, what'd you just say?
I called you a penis and--
(running out the door) Come on!
Dave speeds through morning traffic in his Audi station wagon, leaning on the HORN. Mitch sits shotgun, confused.
Remember last night when we peed into that fountain?! As we peed, we wished we had each other's lives!
Oh fuck.
Our wishes must've... somehow... come true.
I thought wishes came true when you threw a coin into a fountain...
Well apparently urine works too.
That's bullshit! I would've wished for something way cooler!
Unable to find a parking spot, Mitch and Dave double-park Hollywood Boulevard, hop out, and sprint for the plaza...
What are we gonna do when we get to the fountain?! 29.
We're gonna hug each other and pee into the fountain and wish our lives back!
That might sound really gay! Both men race around the corner onto the plaza and stop c
A DEPARTMENT OF PARKS CREW is cleaning up the site where once sat. Mitch and Dave are blown away.

head_text.subj: YOU HAVE GOT TO BE KIDDING ME

text: They hurry up to the crew FOREMAN.
Excuse me! Where is the fountain?!
It's getting restored.
Where did you take it?!
I don't know, chief, I'm not the fountain spokesman, I'm just the guy that fills the fucking hole.
Who could tell us where it is?!
Maybe the district manager?

head_text.subj: A DESK PLACARD READING "DISTRICT MANAGER CARLA NELSON"

text: District Manager CARLA NELSON sits behind her desk in her bland office, her face the model of bureaucratic ennui.
It's not in the computer. Opposite her, Dave and Mitch pull their hair out, insane. 30.
Well of course it's not--!
When will it be in the computer?!
You could try calling tomorrow.
Tomorrow?! We can't wait until tomorrow, Carla!
How can you lose a fountain?.
(beat, deadpan) It's not in the computer. Mitch LUNGES for Carla, but Dave grabs him and wrestles h out of the office.

head_text.subj: YOU ARE EVERYTHING THAT IS WRONG

text: We'll call you tomorrow! Thank you!
Dave and Mitch exit the Department of Parks building and on the sunny sidewalk, their hands on their heads, stunne
This is so fucked...
We should just go home and lock the
Mitch's phone rings in Dave's pocket. Dave hesitates, the answers it, fruitlessly trying to sound like Mitch:
This is fucking Mitch?
I don't talk like that, dude--
Okay ...Okay...Great...Thank you. 31. Dave clicks off.
Who was that?

Marty Green, the producer of Busted Dreams 4. Apparently the guy they cast for Steve Action OD'd last night, and the back-up actor got deported, so, alphabetically, you're the next actor on the list. You got the part, man. Mitch covers his mouth like he just won American Idol.
Oh my God! Oh my God! Dreams really do come true--!
Wait, no, this sucks! I'm stuck in your fat dad-body! I can't play Steve Action looking like this!
(remembering, stunned) Oh my God: and I've got my closing today.
What, is that like a big deal?
A big--?! Yeah! Whether or not I make partner is riding on this!
So what the hell are we gonna do? PANICKED SILENCE. Then Mitch looks at Dave...
No. No. We can't just be each other for a day, Mitch! You have no idea how to be a lawyer!
Dude, I'm an actor, a human chameleon, I can do lawyer in my fucking sleep! It's you I'm worried about: you can't act for shit! 32.

First of all, it's Busted Dreams 4, okay? It's not The Reader. Second of all, I'm a WASP, I've spent my entire life acting happy and no one has ever questioned my performance, okay?! They look at each other, cooling off a bit...
Are...Are we actually considering doing this...?
I mean, we have to...right? Both men look highly anxious. Dave glances at the time.
All right, well, my meeting starts in 45 minutes. You need to race home, get dressed, then go to my office and find my secretary Gladys-
She sounds hot, is she hot?
No. Get the merger docs from Gladys and take them to the conference room. All the partners will be there so do not speak to anyone.
Really? Because I can vamp--

Enh, can't hurt to ask. You wouldn't believe the nasty shit I get girls to do just by asking. Honestly, it's revolting. 97. Ted looks genuinely torn. He dabs his sweaty brow.
